ygData.subject: RE: Tishan's Kilt
ygData.msgSnippet: I have personally gotten one off of them, keep trying... ;o) ... From: Shadowwalker [mailto:Shadowwalker@gralin.com] Sent: Monday, October 25, 1999 11:23 AM
ygData.messageBody:
I have personally gotten one off of them, keep trying... ;o)

-----Original Message-----
From: Shadowwalker [mailto:Shadowwalker@...]
Sent: Monday, October 25, 1999 11:23 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Tishan's Kilt


Has anyone gotten the shadowed ball for the kilt yet? I camped the other
day with two of my level 40+ friends (warrior and a cleric) and we killed
shadowed men nonstop (as fast as was possible. We were constantly waiting
for them to respawn, and they respawn in about 5 min or so) for about 3
hours strait and I saw several shadowed patches, eye, fist, mask, book,
shining stone, and numberless weapons, but no ball. Is it possible to get
it or is it super rare??

-Shadowwalker
